thread.title: Tom Daley's mother unconcerned by 20-year age gap between diver and fiance
thread.title_full: Tom Daley's mother unconcerned by 20-year age gap between diver and fiance

title: Tom Daley's mother unconcerned by 20-year age gap between diver and fiance
text:
By Danielle Joynson , Staff ReporterFiled:   10:38   10:38 UK 
Tom Daley 's mother Debbie has claimed that she has no issues with her son being engaged to a man 20 years his senior. 
The British Olympic diver, 21, announced his engagement to American Oscar-winning director Dustin Lance Black via The Times ' newspaper on Thursday. 
The couple went public with their romance shortly after Daley revealed via a YouTube video in December 2013 that he was in a same-sex relationship. 
In an interview with The Telegraph , Debbie said: "There is an age gap, 20 years, but then again age is but a number. Everyone gets on really with him, even though he is American, but there we go. I am not sad because in losing Tom I am gaining another, so it makes everything all good." 
Daley's mother also confirmed to the Plymouth Herald that the couple will not set a wedding date until after the Rio 2016 Olympic Games, where the diver will be fighting for gold.
